summary: Police commander Simon Weiss, head of the division that supervises Paris's demi-monde, starts out on his nightly tour of bars, discos and strip clubs, making sure once again that the owners... See full summary »
cast: Roschdy Zem|Sara Forestier|Samuel Le Bihan|Grégory Fitoussi|Jean-Pierre Martins|Jean-Paul Muel|Sophie Broustal|Gérald Laroche|Hélène Seuzaret|Kamel Labroudi|Michel Ferracci|Frédéric Graziani|Renorives|Jean-Christophe Bouvet|Laurine Sabban|Zeida Attali|Samuel Theis|Thierry Stein|Magloire Delcros-Varaud|Michel Dussarat|Pierre Lepine|Bing Yin|Massimiliano Verardi|Delphine Grandsart|Baptiste Amann|Philippe Smail|Vincent Rouquès|Lucien Rodriguez|Alain Figlarz|Christophe Maratier|Tchewk Essafi|Charlotte Maury-Sentier|Eric Thomas|Richard Bohringer|Driver|Philippe Isard|Igor Ceban|Philippe Scaglia|Jean-Luc Joseph|Thierry Ardisson|Marc Andréoni|Marina Gauthier|Cyril Hutteau|Régine Lormand|Jean Miez|Sidney Zaoui|David Stone
title: Une nuit
